snippet.title: Is It So Bad Being Stuck With Him? - Sapphire Snowe Game
snippet.description:
She only wants to escape, but a chance encounter with an elemental sends Saffie on a different path entirely as she finds herself trapped in the snowy wilderness.

Help Saffie escape the blizzard and perhaps find peace and more along the way.

Sapphire Snowe GAME: https://melancholy-marionette.itch.io/sapphire-snowe

#visualnovel #gameplay #sapphiresnowe
